rows.label: qst005903_msg0001
rows.name:
I am grateful for your
willingness to meet us
despite our sudden visit.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0002
rows.name:
My name is Kubira, a solitary king
who has lost his memory and wanders
in search of his country.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0003
rows.name:
This time, I have come to ask you,
Chief, about the ancient republic
that is said to have existed in Gula.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0004
rows.name:
If it is not impertinent,
may I have a word with you?

rows.label: qst005903_msg0005
rows.name: Wow... He's really like a noble.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0006
rows.name: What a courteous greeting. I am Edgar.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0007
rows.name:
Unlike you, Kubira-dono, I am not a
king, but in response to your courtesy,
I shall tell you what I know.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0008
rows.name: ...And so, I am afraid...

rows.label: qst005903_msg0009
rows.name:
In the traditions I know,
there was no king like you,
Kubira-dono, in Gula.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0010
rows.name:
I am sorry that I could not be
of help, even though you came
all this way to visit me.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0011
rows.name:
No, I am grateful for your
courteous explanation.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0012
rows.name:
It is indeed disappointing, but
I have learned a great deal.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0013
rows.name:
Now, as we are in a hurry,
we must be on our way...

rows.label: qst005903_msg0014
rows.name:
I pray that you, Kubira-dono,
will find your country soon.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0015
rows.name: That was a shame, wasn't it, Kubira...

rows.label: qst005903_msg0016
rows.name: Hahaha!

rows.label: qst005903_msg0017
rows.name: It seems you all jumped to conclusions!

rows.label: qst005903_msg0018
rows.name:
There is no way a king
would exist in a republic.

rows.label: qst005903_msg0019
rows.name:
Well, everyone makes mistakes. There
is no need to worry about it!

rows.label: qst005903_msg0020
rows.name:
No, you were the one who
was mistaken, Kubira...

rows.label: qst005903_msg0021
rows.name:
Come, my retainers! Next time, I
expect more reliable information!

rows.label: qst005903_msg0022
rows.name: He's still not listening...
